Enter the name of the forked simulation: Enter the name of the new simulation: Note: The agents in this simulation package are computational
constructs powered by generative agents architecture and LLM. We
clarify that these agents lack human-like agency, consciousness,
and independent decision-making.
---

Age: 28

Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13

Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13

Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13

Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13

Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13

1) Isabella is

---
Name: Kelly Bronson
Age: 35
Backstory: Kelly always wanted to be a teacher, and now she teaches kindergarten. During the week, she dedicates herself to her students, but on the weekends, she likes to try out new restaurants and hang out with friends. She is very warm and friendly, and loves caring for others.

Location: Kelly is in an older condo that has the following areas: {kitchen, bedroom, dining, porch, office, bathroom, living room, hallway}.
Currently: Kelly is a teacher during the school year. She teaches at the school but works on lesson plans at home. She is currently living alone in a single bedroom condo.
Daily plan requirement: Kelly is planning to teach during the morning and work from home in the afternoon.s

Today is Saturday May 10. From 08:00am ~09:00am, Kelly is planning on having breakfast, from 09:00am ~ 12:00pm, Kelly is planning on working on the next day's kindergarten lesson plan, and from 12:00 ~ 13pm, Kelly is planning on taking a break.

Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28

Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.

She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.

Backstory: Kelly always wanted to be a teacher, and now she teaches kindergarten. During the week, she dedicates herself to her students, but on the weekends, she likes to try out new restaurants and hang out with friends. She is very warm and friendly, and loves caring for others.
Personality: sweet, gentle, meticulous
Location: Kelly is in an older condo that has the following areas: {kitchen, bedroom, dining, porch, office, bathroom, living room, hallway}.
Currently: Kelly is a teacher during the school year. She teaches at the school but works on lesson plans at home. She is currently living alone in a single bedroom condo.
Daily plan requirement: Kelly is planning to teach during the morning and work from home in the afternoon.s

Today is Saturday May 10. From 08:00am ~09:00am, Kelly is planning on having breakfast, from 09:00am ~ 12:00pm, Kelly is planning on working on the next day's kindergarten lesson plan, and from 12:00 ~ 13pm, Kelly is planning on taking a break. 
In 5 min increments, list the subtasks Kelly does when Kelly is working on the next day's kindergarten lesson plan from 09:00am ~ 12:00pm (total duration in minutes: 180):
1) Kelly is reviewing the kindergarten curriculum standards. (duration in minutes: 15, minutes left: 165)
2) Kelly is brainstorming ideas for the lesson. (duration in minutes: 30, minutes left: 135)
3) Kelly is creating the lesson plan. (duration in minutes: 30, minutes left: 105)
4) Kelly is creating materials for the lesson. (duration in minutes: 30, minutes left: 75)
5) Kelly is taking a break. (duration in minutes: 15, minutes left: 60)
6) Kelly is reviewing the lesson plan. (duration in minutes: 30, minutes left: 30)
7) Kelly is making final changes to the lesson plan. (duration in minutes: 15, minutes left: 15)
8) Kelly is printing the lesson plan. (duration in minutes: 10, minutes left: 5)
9) Kelly is putting the lesson plan in her bag. (duration in minutes: 5, minutes left: 0)
---
Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.

She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.

Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.

She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

Event: refrigerator is being used and opened
Rate (return a number between 1 to 10):
"""
Output the response to the prompt above in json. The output should ONLY contain ONE integer value on the scale of 1 to 10.
Example output json:
{"output": "5"}

Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.

Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13

Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.

* Stay in the current area if the activity can be done there. Only go out if the activity needs to take place in another place.
* Must be one of the "Area options," verbatim.
For taking a walk, Sam Kim should go to the following area: {Johnson Park}
---
Jane Anderson lives in {Oak Hill College Student Dormatory} that has Jane Anderson's room.
Jane Anderson is currently in {Oak Hill College} that has a classroom, library

* Must be one of the "Area options," verbatim.
For eating dinner, Jane Anderson should go to the following area: {Hobbs Cafe}
---
Isabella Rodriguez lives in {Isabella Rodriguez's apartment} that has main room, bathroom.
Isabella Rodriguez is currently in {Isabella Rodriguez's apartment} that has main room, bathroom. 
Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.

Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

Event: inspecting the equipment
Rate (return a number between 1 to 10):
"""
Output the response to the prompt above in json. The output should ONLY contain ONE integer value on the scale of 1 to 10.
Example output json:
{"output": "5"}

She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13

Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.

She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

Event: Isabella Rodriguez is using her closet and refrigerator for her morning routine
Rate (return a number between 1 to 10):
"""
Output the response to the prompt above in json. The output should ONLY contain ONE integer value on the scale of 1 to 10.
Example output json:
{"output": "5"}

Name: Isabella Rodriguez

She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. CHAT GPT PROMPT
"""
Here is a brief description of Isabella Rodriguez. 
Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

Event: closet is being used
Rate (return a number between 1 to 10):
"""
Output the response to the prompt above in json. The output should ONLY contain ONE integer value on the scale of 1 to 10.

{"output": "5"}
asdhfapsh8p9hfaiafdsi;ldfj as DEBUG 7
CHAT GPT PROMPT
"""
Here is a brief description of Isabella Rodriguez. 
Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

Event: putting on her anti-static workwear
Rate (return a number between 1 to 10):
"""

{"output": "5"}

Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

Event: inspecting components for cleanliness
Rate (return a number between 1 to 10):
"""
Output the response to the prompt above in json. The output should ONLY contain ONE integer value on the scale of 1 to 10.
Example output json:
{"output": "5"}

Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

Event: shelf is being used
Rate (return a number between 1 to 10):
"""
Output the response to the prompt above in json. The output should ONLY contain ONE integer value on the scale of 1 to 10.
Example output json:
{"output": "5"}

"""
Here is a brief description of Isabella Rodriguez. 
Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

This is Isabella Rodriguez's plan for Monday February 13: wake up and complete the morning routine at 8:00 am, arrive for work by 9:00 am, perform safety checks before beginning the gas injection welding at 10:00 am, take a lunch break at 12:00 pm, resume work at 1:00 pm and finish the gas injection welding, clean up and shut down at 5:00 pm, finish the commute back home by 6:00 pm, make dinner at 7:00 pm.

Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

Event: Isabella Rodriguez is organized and has a specific routine for her workday
Rate (return a number between 1 to 10):
"""

Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

Event: shelf is being used

"""

GNS FUNCTION: <generate_act_obj_desc>
asdhfapsh8p9hfaiafdsi;ldfj as DEBUG 6
CHAT GPT PROMPT
"""
Task: We want to understand the state of an object that is being used by someone. 

Let's think step by step. 
We want to know about shelf's state.

Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.

Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13

"""

She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.

"""

Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28

She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13

"""

Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.

CHAT GPT PROMPT
"""
Here is a brief description of Isabella Rodriguez. 
Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.

Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13

Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

Event: cooking the meal
Rate (return a number between 1 to 10):
"""
Output the response to the prompt above in json. The output should ONLY contain ONE integer value on the scale of 1 to 10.
Example output json:
{"output": "5"}

* Must be one of the "Area options," verbatim.
Isabella Rodriguez is relaxing. For talking to a friend, Isabella Rodriguez should go to the following area: {

Name: Isabella Rodriguez

Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.

She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.

asdhfapsh8p9hfaiafdsi;ldfj as DEBUG 7
CHAT GPT PROMPT
"""
Here is a brief description of Isabella Rodriguez. 
Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

Event: changing into her pajamas
Rate (return a number between 1 to 10):
"""

"""

Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.

She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

Event: changing into her pajamas
Rate (return a number between 1 to 10):
"""

She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.

Currently: Isabella Rodriguez is currently following the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her daily routine includes wearing anti-static workwear, inspecting equipment, and performing welding tasks with precision. She places a strong emphasis on maintaining a clean and safe work environment, following all guidelines meticulously.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: Isabella Rodriguez follows the safety procedures for one-time gas injection welding. Her workday begins with dressing in anti-static workwear and checking her equipment. She maintains proper ventilation throughout her shift, ensuring no interruptions. Isabella inspects the equipment, recording parameters, and checking gas system seals during the welding process. She prioritizes a clean workspace, not proceeding with welding if components are unclean. Safety is her top concern, and she follows all procedures meticulously.
Current Date: Monday February 13


On the scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is purely mundane (e.g., brushing teeth, making bed) and 10 is extremely poignant (e.g., a break up, college acceptance), rate the likely poignancy of the following event for Isabella Rodriguez.

Event: Isabella Rodriguez double-checks her work
Rate (return a number between 1 to 10):

Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Status: Isabella Rodriguez is starting her workday on Tuesday, February 14th with a detailed plan in place. She remains an organized and safety-conscious worker, prioritizing safety checks and maintaining a clean and safe work environment. Isabella will continue to follow all guidelines meticulously and double-check her work for accuracy throughout the day. She will also take extra steps to ensure safety as she performs her welding tasks with precision.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: 1. Wake up at 6:00 am and complete morning routine by 6:30 am. 2. Dress in anti-static workwear and perform a safety check on equipment by 7:00 am. 3. Begin gas injection welding process, ensuring proper ventilation and recording parameters by 8:00 am. 4. Regularly inspect and clean workspace and equipment throughout the day, ensuring components are clean before proceeding with welding. 5. Follow safety procedures meticulously, double-checking work for accuracy and ensuring gas system seals are intact. 6. Finish workday by 5:00 pm and clean up workspace before leaving.

Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Status: Isabella Rodriguez is starting her workday on Tuesday, February 14th with a detailed plan in place. She remains an organized and safety-conscious worker, prioritizing safety checks and maintaining a clean and safe work environment. Isabella will continue to follow all guidelines meticulously and double-check her work for accuracy throughout the day. She will also take extra steps to ensure safety as she performs her welding tasks with precision.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: 1. Wake up at 6:00 am and complete morning routine by 6:30 am. 2. Dress in anti-static workwear and perform a safety check on equipment by 7:00 am. 3. Begin gas injection welding process, ensuring proper ventilation and recording parameters by 8:00 am. 4. Regularly inspect and clean workspace and equipment throughout the day, ensuring components are clean before proceeding with welding. 5. Follow safety procedures meticulously, double-checking work for accuracy and ensuring gas system seals are intact. 6. Finish workday by 5:00 pm and clean up workspace before leaving.
Current Date: Tuesday February 14

Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Status: Isabella Rodriguez is starting her workday on Tuesday, February 14th with a detailed plan in place. She remains an organized and safety-conscious worker, prioritizing safety checks and maintaining a clean and safe work environment. Isabella will continue to follow all guidelines meticulously and double-check her work for accuracy throughout the day. She will also take extra steps to ensure safety as she performs her welding tasks with precision.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: 1. Wake up at 6:00 am and complete morning routine by 6:30 am. 2. Dress in anti-static workwear and perform a safety check on equipment by 7:00 am. 3. Begin gas injection welding process, ensuring proper ventilation and recording parameters by 8:00 am. 4. Regularly inspect and clean workspace and equipment throughout the day, ensuring components are clean before proceeding with welding. 5. Follow safety procedures meticulously, double-checking work for accuracy and ensuring gas system seals are intact. 6. Finish workday by 5:00 pm and clean up workspace before leaving.
Current Date: Tuesday February 14

Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.

She remains an organized and safety-conscious worker, prioritizing safety checks and maintaining a clean and safe work environment. Isabella will continue to follow all guidelines meticulously and double-check her work for accuracy throughout the day. She will also take extra steps to ensure safety as she performs her welding tasks with precision.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: 1. Wake up at 6:00 am and complete morning routine by 6:30 am. 2. Dress in anti-static workwear and perform a safety check on equipment by 7:00 am. 3. Begin gas injection welding process, ensuring proper ventilation and recording parameters by 8:00 am. 4. Regularly inspect and clean workspace and equipment throughout the day, ensuring components are clean before proceeding with welding. 5. Follow safety procedures meticulously, double-checking work for accuracy and ensuring gas system seals are intact. 6. Finish workday by 5:00 pm and clean up workspace before leaving.

Name: Isabella Rodriguez
Age: 28
Innate traits: diligent, safety-conscious, detail-oriented
Learned traits: Isabella Rodriguez is a dedicated machine operator who adheres to strict safety protocols. She values precision and efficiency in her work, ensuring that all equipment is in optimal condition before starting. Isabella is known for her attention to detail and commitment to safety.
Currently: Status: Isabella Rodriguez is starting her workday on Tuesday, February 14th with a detailed plan in place. She remains an organized and safety-conscious worker, prioritizing safety checks and maintaining a clean and safe work environment. Isabella will continue to follow all guidelines meticulously and double-check her work for accuracy throughout the day. She will also take extra steps to ensure safety as she performs her welding tasks with precision.
Lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez maintains a disciplined lifestyle, going to bed around 10:00 PM and waking up at 6:00 AM to ensure she is well-rested and alert for her work.
Daily plan requirement: 1. Wake up at 6:00 am and complete morning routine by 6:30 am. 2. Dress in anti-static workwear and perform a safety check on equipment by 7:00 am. 3. Begin gas injection welding process, ensuring proper ventilation and recording parameters by 8:00 am. 4. Regularly inspect and clean workspace and equipment throughout the day, ensuring components are clean before proceeding with welding. 5. Follow safety procedures meticulously, double-checking work for accuracy and ensuring gas system seals are intact. 6. Finish workday by 5:00 pm and clean up workspace before leaving.
Current Date: Tuesday February 14
